author: junsong_eth
content:
Hey all, I'd like to inform that we achieved all tasks in the [initial TODO list](https://hackmd.io/@junsong/SyKN0UFZZg) in Prysm. 

Working branch with <@944007601400741989>:

https://github.com/developeruche/prysm/tree/poc/optional-proofs

There are several ethereum-package scripts here that work well, including interop test with Lighthouse (<@427491045308235776> 's implementation)
